results.title: Statin cost-effectiveness in the United States for people at different vascular risk levels.
results.text_hl: For an average of 5 years, allocation to @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduced the estimated US costs of hospitalizations for @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_System_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D057772 @@@vascular@@@ events by approximately 20% (95% CI, 15 to 24) in the different subcategories of participants studied.

citations.NLM: Heart Protection Study Collaborative Group. Statin cost-effectiveness in the United States for people at different vascular risk levels. Circ Cardiovasc Qual Outcomes. 2009 Mar;2(2):65-72. PMID: 20031817

results.title: Simvastatin enhances the regeneration of endothelial cells via VEGF secretion in injured arteries.
results.text_hl: We here report that the carotid arterial blood flow after @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_System_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D057772 @@@endothelial injury@@@ in @SPECIES_10026 @@@hamsters@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was restored, in contrast to the situation in nontreated @SPECIES_10026 @@@hamsters@@@.

results.title: Effect of simvastatin on physiological and biological outcomes in patients undergoing esophagectomy: a randomized placebo-controlled trial.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: In this proof of concept study, pretreatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in esophagectomy decreased biomarkers of @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ as well as pulmonary epithelial and systemic @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_System_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D057772 @@@endothelial injury@@@.

results.title: MRC/BHF Heart Protection Study of cholesterol lowering with simvastatin in 20,536 high-risk individuals: a randomised placebo-controlled trial.
results.text_hl: Hence, among the many types of high-risk individual studied, 5 years of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ would prevent about 70-100 people per 1000 from suffering at least one of these major @<m>DISEASE_Vascular_System_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D057772 @@@vascular@@@ events (and longer treatment should produce further benefit).
